sn22.22:2: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, bhārahāro? Puggalo tissa vacanīyaṁ. Yvāyaṁ āyasmā evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto; ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhārahāro.
sn22.22:3: Katamañca, bhikkhave, bhārādānaṁ? Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ – kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā. Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhārādānaṁ.
sn22.22:4: Katamañca, bhikkhave, bhāranikkhepanaṁ? Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo. Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhāranikkhepanan"ti.
sn22.22:5: Idamavoca bhagavā. Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.22:6: "Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā,bhārahāro ca puggalo;Bhārādānaṁ dukhaṁ loke,bhāranikkhepanaṁ sukhaṁ.
sn22.22:7: Nikkhipitvā garuṁ bhāraṁ,aññaṁ bhāraṁ anādiya;Samūlaṁ taṇhamabbuyha,nicchāto parinibbuto"ti.
